categories: Category:Creatures of the Outer Rim Territories

nodes.text: The Hismauli hawk-snake was a species native to the Hismaul system in the the galaxy by the year 0 ABY. Professional gambler Lando Calrissian stated that a Zeltron, who ran a brewery owned by Calrissian on the planet Clendor, was as mean as one of these snakes.
The Hismauli hawk-snake was first mentioned in 2012's The Essential Guide to Warfare, written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart as a guide dedicated to the conflicts in the Star Wars galaxy.
